name: Nyan Nyan War
description:
Collect coins, grow your cat army, and destroy the opposing castle! For 2 local players!

By Komogi (Billy Bao) and Mr. P29 (Min)

---------------- Controls ----------------
P1: WASD, Space

P2: Arrow Keys, Shift

(Made for Brackey's Game Jam 2021)

---------------- Sprites & Art ----------------
PIPOYA Sprites NEKONIN by pipoya
(https://pipoya.itch.io/)
RPG Nature Tielset by Stealthix
(https://stealthix.itch.io/rpg-nature-tileset)
Free Pixel Art Forest by edermunizz
(https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest)
UI Button by Kicked-in-teeth
(https://kicked-in-teeth.itch.io/button-ui)
Controller assets 1 bit by RetryEli
(https://retryeli.itch.io/1bit-controller)
Additional Art by Gon-Fan (Billy) Bao and Mr.P29

------------------- Font -------------------
Alagard Font by Pix3M
(https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-fonts-by-pix3m)
